description.translate: Your lowliness does not bother you, because it ensures your protection...

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Ska ou ra\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Ta petitesse ne te gène point,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7car elle t'assure protection...\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Your lowliness does not bother you,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7because it ensures your protection...\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7DAR§a1 §7HUN§c-2\"}"]}}
